meanings.definition: A fruit with a tough skin and a large seed inside.
meanings.sent1: I enjoy eating avocados in my salad.
meanings.sent2: Avocados are a great source of healthy fats.
meanings.sent3: Why did the guacamole go to the party alone? Because it couldn't find its avocados!
meanings.sent4: Her heart was like an avocado, tough on the outside but soft on the inside.
meanings.sent5: The avocado tree in our backyard produces the most delicious fruits.

meanings.definition: A green or blackish fruit with a creamy texture.
meanings.sent1: The creamy texture of avocados makes them perfect for smoothies.
meanings.sent2: Avocados are a versatile ingredient in many dishes.
meanings.sent3: Why did the toast break up with the avocado? It couldn't handle its creamy texture!
meanings.sent4: His voice was as smooth as an avocado, calming everyone around him.
meanings.sent5: The ripe avocados at the market were a beautiful shade of green.
